reviews.review: В неё играю злыдни писюкатые и школьники постоянно кричащее что то про свою и чужую мамашу

I play this game when I mess something up big time in life. Don't fill out the correct paperwork at work and get chewed out by your manlet boss? CS:GO! Wife being so annoying that you're thinking about pulling an O.J. Simpson? CS:GO! Run over your kid pulling out the driveway? CS:GO! I like it not because it's fun, but because it is a method of punishment for myself. I know at the end of a good game of Dust 2 that ends up at 2:16, I've successfully wasted more of my precious time before death in pure agony, just like I deserved!

10/10 would play over autoerotic asphyxiation again!
nice game valve...... plz update VAC
Juego competitivo, tiene algunas variaciones para los que les gusta jugar entorno a objetivos y diferentes modalidades para todos los gustos, en verdad es algo toxico la comunidad pero cual no?
Um dos melhores jogos de todos os tempos, porém está cheio de hackers...
